nodes.text: Star Wars Insider 119 is the 97th issue of the magazine Star Wars Insider and the 27th published by Titan Magazines. It was released on July 27, 2010.

This issue features our 30th Anniversary celebration of Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back with the cast and crew recalling the making of a movie classic and Irvin Kershner discussing his role as director. Billy Dee Williams also talks about playing Lando Calrissian.
As a special edition, it features six different covers: three newsstand covers, one exclusively available at conventions, one subscriber cover, and one exclusively available at comic stores.
